TopicTitle: July 20th extravaganza and discussion. Streamers needed!

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. Those of you who know me, I've technically been a KSP YouTuber since v0.13 (I have one slideshow of it), and a streamer since march. If any of you stream KSP and aren't mentioning it, I am gathering a fleet of KSP streamers who wish to honor Apollo 11 and its landing in the sea of tranquility. I need YOU. I posted this here instead of challenges as I know many streamers view this page and this is more oriented towards honoring the landing rather than making it a challenge.

Comment below if you'd watch, and comment below if you will stream.

Streamers:

Avera9eJoe - Saturbo V

YOU

Later.

Edited July 14, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
